013package org.apache.juneau.oapi;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.oapi.annotation.*;
017
018/**
019 * Metadata on bean properties specific to the OpenAPI serializers and parsers pulled from the {@link OpenApi @OpenApi}
020 * annotation on the bean property.
021 *
022 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
023 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#jm.OpenApiDetails">OpenAPI Details</a>
024
025 * </ul>
026 */
027public final class OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta extends ExtendedBeanPropertyMeta {
028
029   /**
030    * Default instance.
031    */
032   public static final OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta DEFAULT = new OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta();
033
034   /**
035    * Constructor.
036    *
037    * @param bpm The metadata of the bean property of this additional metadata.
038    * @param mp OpenApi metadata provider (for finding information about other artifacts).
039    */
040   public OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta(BeanPropertyMeta bpm, OpenApiMetaProvider mp) {
041      super(bpm);
042   }
043
044   private OpenApiBeanPropertyMeta() {
045      super(null);
046   }
047}
